Articles.Content:
I just found this

http://i62.tinypic.com/33tsbpi.jpg

It said that the prograde/ retrograde are green. I've lways seen the vectors as yellow. I see the velocity meter at the top as green. What's the colour actually? Am I Colourblind or something?

Prograde is greenish-yellow, retrograde is yellowish-green.

More seriously, it's an intermediate color.

Thing is, I don't se any green, it's 100% yellow for me.

I think I'm colourblind.

Ever calibrated your monitor?

If not - than this might be the cause. Some screens are very very poor in reproducing colors.

They are grellow. I see them as yellow, but there is a hint of greenyness. Of course how you see colours depends on the colours around them, on a black background they might look more green.

if you have photoshop you should have an adobe colour adjusting thingy in your control panel that can get your colours a bit more accurate, otherwise you can find similar colour adjusty things online or use the windows colour management thingy in control panel, most screens except very crap ones should be able to show colours well enough if set up right.

Paint says this is what it is it:

Yellow, with a bit of extra green and blue.

Sort of...dark-ish cyany yellow.

Glad we got this sorted out! To think they trust us with rockets. XD

Personally I think it is greenish-yellow.
We'd call this "dirty yellow" in my country
